item.title: SDL2 Tutorial in C [01] - Creating a Window, Renderer, and Setting an FPS Cap
item.description: TL;DR Skip to Putting it all together section of this post to see the whole code. Getting SDL2 Windows - MSYS2 mingw64 pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-SDL2 Ubuntu sudo apt install libsdl2-dev From SDL2 Website You can get SDL2 development libraries for your platform on the official website’s download page https://www.libsdl.org/download-2.0.php. Overview A typical SDL2 application does the following: Initialize SDL subsystems. Create a window. Create a renderer. Process events, update data, and draw objects to screen, repeatedly until the program is stopped.
